import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FizzBuzzService } from './fizz-buzz.service'; import {ChangeDetectorRef } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fizzbuzz', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { seriesFB: any; randomNumber!: number; limit!: number; randomN!: number; fizzColor!: string; buzzColor!: string; constructor(private fizzBuzzService: FizzBuzzService, private cdr: ChangeDetectorRef) { } ngOnInit(): void { } generateSeries(): void { this.fizzColor = this.getRandomColor(); this.buzzColor = this.getRandomColor(); this.fizzBuzzService.getFizzBuzzSeries(this.randomNumber, this.limit).subscribe((series: any) => { this.seriesFB = series; }); } generateRandom(min =1, max=100) { this.randomNumber= Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min; } formIsValid() { return this.limit > this.randomNumber; } isNumber(val: any): boolean { return typeof val === 'number'; } getSquareColor(element: number | string): any { let color = '' if (element === 'fizz') { color = this.fizzColor;} else if (element === 'buzz') { color = this.buzzColor;} else if (element === 'buzz') { color = this.buzzColor;} // else // if (element === 'fizzbuzz') { // color = this.getSquareGradient();} else{ color = this.getRandomColor() } this.cdr.dete return color } getSquareGradient(element: number | string): any { if (element === 'fizzbuzz') { return `linear-gradient(to right, ${this.fizzColor}, ${this.buzzColor})`; } } getRandomColor(): string { const letters = '0123456789ABCDEF'; let color = '#'; for (let i = 0; i < 6; i++) { color += letters[Math.floor(Math.random() * 16)]; } return color; } }
